## validators variable

List of all validators available

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
validators: {
    EMAIL: () => _validatorWithoutArgsType;
    PASSWORD: () => _validatorWithoutArgsType;
    REQUIRE: () => {
        type: Validator;
    };
    MINLENGTH: (val: number) => {
        type: ValidatorWithArgs;
        val: number;
    };
    MAXLENGTH: (val: number) => {
        type: ValidatorWithArgs;
        val: number;
    };
}
```
